attributes.action: Northern Ireland Health Service User's Getting 21ST Century Banking Account's
attributes.additional_details: Show People With Disabilities In Northern Ireland That There Entitled To 21ST Century Private Banking Account's
attributes.background: To Change The Law In Northern Ireland So People With Disabilities Have 21ST Century Private Banking Account's Of There Choice UK Government Abolished Capacity Assessments And Patients Private Property Account's Are No Longer Fit For Purpose UK Government Take Action And Talk To Ni Health Minister

rejection.details:
We have to reject petitions that call for action at a local level. This is a devolved issue which is the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Assembly.

You could ask your MLA to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this.

You can find contact details for your local MLA here: https://aims.niassembly.gov.uk/mlas/contacts.aspx
